metadata.description: Multi-tentacled orchestration plugin for Claude Code

plugins.name: claude-octopus
plugins.description: v7.16.0 - UX Enhancements: Real-time progress with spinner verbs, workflow summaries with costs/timing, timeout warnings. All 29 personas, 28 commands, 33 skills documented. Validation Gate Pattern enforces multi-AI (100% compliance, 4x faster, 70% token savings). Requires Claude Code v2.1.16+. Run /octo:setup.
